name: Shivani Sharma
about: Dynamic and results-oriented Senior Specialist in Supply Chain, currently pursuing an MBA in Business Analytics. Proficient in managing and optimizing supply-demand processes with proven experience in data analysis, forecasting, and strategic collaboration across multiple teams. Recognized for driving productivity and profitability in high-value segments. Exceptional communicator adept at building relationships and enhancing team collaboration.

recommendations: Dipal Parmar “Shivani was the Class Representative in our M.Tech class. She has been an excellent leader and team player. She has always shown responsible behaviour throughout her working period as CR. She also worked as an Internship coordinator. She helped our class to have a smooth and easy process of internship. She also helped me a lot when i started to work as a placement coordinator. She has always been friendly with everyone.”
